item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 13, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Porting SBCL to the Nintendo Switch (225 points | 38 comments)
3. Martin Luther King Jr. In Berlin (33 points | 4 comments)

7. Meta fed its AI on everything adults have publicly posted since 2007 (98 points | 86 comments)
8. CS Career fair cancelled at community college because no companies reached out (45 points | 17 comments)
9. Supabase (YC S20) Is Hiring Postgres SREs [Fully Remote] ( | hide)
10. FDA Authorizes First Over-the-Counter Hearing Aid Software (335 points | 184 comments)

21. Boeing workers vote to strike (456 points | 411 comments)
22. Notes on OpenAI's new o1 chain-of-thought models (580 points | 513 comments)
23. Safe Assignment (10 points | 6 comments)

25. Exploring the scalable matrix extension of the Apple M4 processor (139 points | 25 comments)
26. Cloud atlas of Mars reveals an atmosphere unlike our own (22 points | 10 comments)
27. Data sleuths who spotted research misconduct cleared of defamation (513 points | 99 comments)
28. Notepat – Aesthetic Computer (143 points | 33 comments)
29. F3 – Fight Flash Fraud (122 points | 42 comments)
